author: Orion Rummler
title: U.S. and Canada close border for 30 more days as coronavirus prevails
description: The U.S. and Canada have agreed to maintain border restrictions for 30 more days to combat the novel coronavirus, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said at a press conference on Saturday. What's happening: President Trump tweeted on March 18 that the neighboring …
content:
The U.S. and Canada have agreed to maintain border restrictions for 30 more days to combat the novel coronavirus, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said at a press conference on Saturday.
